events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected. I want to request a refund.
The customer's message includes a refund request, categorizing this case under the Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to support agent Emily for handling the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear the product did not meet your expectations. I’m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can assist you better?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The product was not as described on the website, so I’m not satisfied and would like my money back.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your order. You should receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and resolution. I appreciate your help with the refund.
The refund case has been marked as resolved since the refund process was successfully initiated and accepted by the customer.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist with.
Since the customer has confirmed receipt of refund and no further issues were reported, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
